data.title: add Findmuparser cmake module instead of using pkg
data.meta_description: I was having issues with pkg-config not finding muparser on the spatial-model-editor ci builds This should be more portable, and doesn't require pkg-config to be...
data.text:
I was having issues with pkg-config not finding muparser on the spatial-model-editor ci builds

This should be more portable, and doesn't require pkg-config to be installed (e.g. on windows)
